name: Idle Champions: Masquerade Ball Lae'zel Skin & Feat Pack
summary: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Lae'zel (if you don't already own them) Masquerade Ball Lae'zel Skin An Epic Feat for Lae'zel 7 Gold Lae'zel Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts
